Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24806 affecting package python-gevent for versions less than 23.9.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24806 affecting package python-gevent for versions less than 23.9.1-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-gevent is earlier than 23.9.1-3, affected by CVE-2024-24806
